name: The Oddly Satisfying Liquid Dream Machine
name_original: The Oddly Satisfying Liquid Dream Machine
description:
Welcome to the Liquid Machine, a throwback to the 1993 Incredible Machine. 

use your mouse to place and rotate platforms then release the fluid, the goal is to get the liquid from one container to the other. 

Every platform you use will cost you a bit of your score in the end so try to use as little platforms as possible. 

At the end of every level your high score is sent to a online leaderboard that gets recent periodically, can you beat your own score? or the current leader?  

project is in its early form with currently 6 levels and 5 different objects that can be placed ( though the turn pipe currently has very little use )
